@wp.kernel
def rand_expr_zyeknl(data: wp.array(dtype=float)):
    tid = wp.tid()
    v0 = data[tid]
    v1 = 0.0
    v2 = 1.0
    tmp = 0.0
    v0 = wp.exp(0.09)
    v0 = (v2 / v0)
    v1 = v0
    tmp = (tmp * ((tmp + 0.04 - v2 + 0.41) + (v0 + 0.11 / v2 + 0.22)))
    v0 = 0.17
    tmp = ((0.83 - (v2 + 0.50 * tmp + 0.21)) + wp.cos((v2 + 0.03 / v0 + 0.41)))
    v0 = v2
    data[tid] = v0
